title: My Husband is Emotionally Absent
itunes:title: My Husband is Emotionally Absent
description:
Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. In this episode, a wife asks how to reach her emotionally absent husband. Should she try advice from a previous podcast or try something out completely new?

To ask a question of your own visit: www.wivesofjanah.com/askaquestion 

Learn about relationship coaching: 
www.wivesofjannah.com/coaching

To download a free ebook visit:
www.wivesofjanah.com/ebooks
